exceptions.tactic: intros g f x H1 H2 H3.
intros g' f x H1 H2 H3.
intros g' f' x H1 H2 H3.
intros g' f' x' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros g f x H1 H2 H3. unfold ex_lim in *. destruct H1 as [l1 H1]. destruct H2 as [l2 H2]. unfold ex_Rbar_minus in *. unfold ex_Rbar_plus in *. unfold is_lim in *. exists (l1 - l2). apply is_lim_minus'; auto.
